biography.bio: Macha Méril was born on September 3, 1940 in Rabat, Morocco as Marie-Madeleine Gagarine. She is an actress and producer, known for Deep Red (1975), Belle de Jour (1967) and Une Femme Mariée (1964). She has been married to Michel Legrand since September 18, 2014. She was previously married to Gian Vittorio Baldi.
biography.name: Macha Méril

biography.bio: Actress Hélène Vincent's second name is far from meaningless since it is also her husband's. And given that her companion's first name is Jean-Pierre you can easily guess what -- among other qualities -- attracted theater enthusiast Hélène to renowned stage director Jean-Pierre. For drama has always been Hélène Vincent's passion. That is the reason why she has -- most of the time -- privileged her career on the stage over the rest of her activities, whether as an actress (for stage directors such as Patrice Chéreau, Bernard Sobel, and of course Jean-Pierre Vincent) or as a stage director (for plays by Strindberg, Ibsen, or Shakespeare). She has found enough time for a substantial television career though but a little less for the cinema where her appearances are erratic. In the latter case, her big break came in 1987 after a pair of undistinguished roles (debuting in two movies by theater/art film director René Allio), when she was chosen by Étienne Chatiliez to interpret her most famous character to date, Marielle Le Quesnois, a preppy, goody-goody, well-to-do catholic mother, in the bitingly hilarious La vie est un long fleuve tranquille (1988). Her fine performance gained her a César Award the next year and gave a boost to her movie career although debatable choices and the priority given to theater have not made her the star she could have become. All the same she got another César nomination for her role as Evelyne in André Téchiné's dark J'embrasse pas (1991), and was noticeable as Albert Dupontel's unworthy mother in his trash comedy Bernie (1996). One of her best roles lately is that of the manipulative mother in Chris Vander Stappen's little seen but brilliant bittersweet comedy Que faisaient les femmes pendant que l'homme marchait sur la lune? (2000) Alternately supercilious or daft according to the roles she is given, she will remain Mme Le Quesnoy forever in the heart of film lovers. And how could they forget a line from La vie est un long fleuve tranquille (1988) such as "C'est lundi, c'est raviolis", all the more as these mundane nwords are uttered with suave incongruity by always reliable Hélène Vincent, one of France's best character actresses.
biography.name: Hélène Vincent

biography.bio: Alexis Michalik was born on December 13, 1982 in Paris, France. He is an actor and director, known for Inconnue de la départementale (2006), Stomach (2015) and Big Kiss (2004).
biography.name: Alexis Michalik

biography.bio: Andréa Ferréol was born on January 6, 1947 in Aix-en-Provence, France. She is an actress, known for Le dernier métro (1980), A Zed & Two Noughts (1985) and The Tin Drum (1979).
biography.name: Andréa Ferréol

biography.bio: Anne Jacquemin is an actress and art director, known for Les trois frères (1995), La comtesse de Charny (1989) and Vice vertu et vice versa (1996).
biography.name: Anne Jacquemin

biography.bio: Christian Charmetant is an actor and director, known for Famille d'accueil (2001), La veuve de Saint-Pierre (2000) and Harrison's Flowers (2000).
biography.name: Christian Charmetant

biography.bio: Catherine Hosmalin is an actress, known for Mr. Bean's Holiday (2007), Il y a longtemps que je t'aime (2008) and La goula (1986).
biography.name: Catherine Hosmalin

biography.bio: Diana Rudychenko is an actress and director, known for Mortem (2010), La belle endormie (2010) and Coup d'éclat (2011).
biography.name: Diana Rudychenko

biography.bio: Patrick Préjean was born on June 4, 1944 in Saint-Maur-des-Fossés, Val-de-Marne, France. He is known for his work on My Mother's Castle (1990), Space Goofs (1997) and Astérix et le coup du menhir (1989).
biography.name: Patrick Préjean

biography.bio: Henri Guybet was born on December 21, 1936 in Paris, France. He is an actor, known for The Mad Adventures of 'Rabbi' Jacob (1973), The Pawn (1978) and On a retrouvé la 7ème Compagnie! (1975).
biography.name: Henri Guybet

biography.bio: Gilles Azzopardi is an actor, known for Enquêtes réservées (2009), La trouvaille de Juliette (2014) and Paul Sauvage (2004).
biography.name: Gilles Azzopardi

biography.bio: Michèle Hery is an actress, known for Soir de fête (2013), La Minute Vieille (2012) and Le secret (2000).
biography.name: Michèle Hery

biography.bio: Jean-Marc Coudert is an actor, known for La cage aux folles (2011), Army of Crime (2009) and Vieilles canailles (2010).
biography.name: Jean-Marc Coudert

biography.bio: Melanie Baxter Jones is an actress, known for The Children of the Marshland (1999), Effroyables jardins (2003) and Toutes nos envies (2011).
biography.name: Melanie Baxter Jones

biography.bio: Blandine Bellavoir is known for her work on Plus belle la vie (2004), Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie (2009) and Elles... Les filles du Plessis (2016).
biography.name: Blandine Bellavoir
